pages.text: The Firework Rocket is the main component for the $(l:firework_rain)Rain$(/l) -and $(l:firework_anti_rain)Anti Rain Rockets$(/l) of Waterworks.$(br2)They are part of vanilla Minecraft.$(br2)The next pages will give some information on how to craft Firework Rockets.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Firework Rockets use a shapeless recipe form.$(br)The easiest crafting recipe is by using a single Paper and a Gunpowder.$(br)You will get some rockets with a flight duration of "1".$(br)Adding more Gunpowder to the recipe will increase the flight duration.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Additional to Paper and Gunpowder, a Firework Star can be added.$(br)As there are nearly unlimited combination of items for the star, the $(l:https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Firework_Star) Minecraft Wiki$(/l) page will be a better place.
